reviewtext: Great sound quality, comfortable, pretty rugged; these survive catching the cable on things, being dropped, etc.  I break a pair every year or so and just keep a spare on hand.  These work just as well for me as $50 headphones.These work great with my iPod.  Won't work with an iPhone (or other cell phone), which uses a different connector (4 connections instead of 3) to support a microphone.
